InformationStage.enInformation:
🌈 Welcome to community whose main goal is cohesion of people learning English; improvement, development and comprehensive support of all skills related to language. 🌈
You can create some meeting to speak or join to existing one. 🙏🏻

CreateMeetingByTemplateStage.enInstruction: Here you can create meeting using template and example :)
CreateMeetingByTemplateStage.example:
NEW MEETING REQUEST:

DATE: 
14.01.2020 19-00

LOCATION: 
—É–ª. –ù–µ–º–∏–≥–∞ 5, –õ–∏–¥–æ

QUESTIONS:

‚óè Does your mother of father know how to use a computer?
‚óè Do computers make life easier?
‚óè What websites do you visit in a regular basis?
‚óè What do you think about the Apple?
‚óè What are some advantages of using social networks?
‚óè Do you visit English websites?

SelectWayMeetingCreationStage.enMain:
Please, choose the way to create new meeting!

‚òù🏻Template.
Using template (plain text) to create new meeting.
Just copy existing template and fill it with all required data such as date, location, english level etc...


‚úå🏻Step by step.
Create new meeting by answering questions about meeting details.

ParticipantsMeetingCreationSBSStage.input:
The number of participants can be different. In my experience, I recommend arranging small meetings for 3-4 people, otherwise speaking turns into just listening 😅

How many people do you want to practice your English with?

LocationMeetingCreationSBSStage.input:
Where would you like to meet? 
Please, type in or attach the address (e.g —É–ª. –ù–µ–º–∏–≥–∞ 6)
LocationMeetingCreationSBSStage.mapAttachment: In this step you need to clarify the place where meeting will take place 🤗 You can write street name (e.g –ù–µ–º–∏–≥–∞ 25, —É–ª–∏—Ü–∞ –ö–∞–ª—å–≤–∞—Ä–∏–π—Å–∫–∞—è 65) or attach map using Telegram feature, it's up to you which method to use. Above you can find example of map attachment.👆

TopicMeetingCreationSBSStage.input:
It‚Äôs always better to choose the topic of the meeting beforehand. This way you will be able not only to review your vocabulary and prepare the words you may need to use. But also spend a pleasant time in an engaging conversation without making any awkward pauses‚Ä¶
Trust me, I know what I‚Äôm talking about! 😏

You can choose one of the random topics from our catalogue or come up with your own.

What would you like to talk about?

FinalMeetingCreationSBSStage.input: Please, check the details of the meeting one last time and press ‚ÄòConfirm‚Äô.

FormatMeetingCreationSBSStage.input: Hmmm...🤔 What exactly is ‚ÄòMeeting format‚Äô? Let‚Äôs see! It means the place where you want to get in contact with your speaking partners. ‚Ä¢ For online meetings our community uses Skype calls so, please, make sure, that you have this program on your device. ‚Ä¢ Offline meetings take place in the ‚Äôreal life‚Äô. It can be your favorite caf√© or just bench in a park. So it‚Äôs really up to you to decide! 😌 Which option do you prefer?

DeleteSingleMeetingStage.main: Your meeting has been deleted 😞 Maybe we could reschedule? /create
DeleteSingleMeetingStage.deleteNotification:
Hey! Unfortunately, /meeting%s owner decided to cancel the meeting and deleted it 😥
I know, it's sad... But don't worry! You can find other meetings /active or even create your own!

Have a good day! 😉

WelcomeStage.intro:
Welcome to the best English Speaking Club!🤗
Nice to meet you! I will help to improve your speaking skills as much as possible!💪
All necessary information you can find in 'Information' section!
/help

IntroStartMeetingCreationStage.main:
Wow! You‚Äôre really motivated to speak English! We‚Äôre happy to see that kind of eager from you! 😈

Creating a meeting is actually easier than you might think! And it won‚Äôt take much of your time either. You can find all related information here [link]. 

Right now we‚Äôre going to ask you a few questions and see what your perfect meeting looks like. Just follow the tips on the bottom of each message. 

After you create a meeting, everyone in the community group will receive a notification, so that they can join you later.

And REMEMBER: Practice makes perfect! 💪
